experience.title: System Administrator
experience.description: 12 Computer Systems Administrator for the EOps-ECC-WSSB-BSS-CIS group. Responsibilities include maintaining servers operation and security, analyzing hardware and software components, writing and handling tickets, coordinating with IRS personnel and vendors, onboarding new servers to the domain, asset management with KISAM, applying patches, monitoring HIDS and antivirus, and documenting troubleshooting steps. Also involved in training and creating procedures; responsible for system diagnostics, performance optimization, and ensuring compliance with security controls.

experience.title: System Administrator
experience.description: System Administrator responsible for multi-tasking across multiple projects, supervising CIS section, training new staff, supporting 500+ servers, maintaining Windows domains, performing server hardening and patching, and coordinating with IRS IT staff and contractors. Responsibilities include installing and configuring software and hardware, writing documentation, and ensuring security and compliance.

experience.title: Computer System Administrator
experience.description: Assisted electronic filing programmers by analyzing and diagnosing software errors to pass IRS electronic filing standards. Used IRS IRM to transmit standard test returns, identified and communicated programming errors, collaborated with Tax Examiners, managed data archival to nine-track tapes and mainframe processing, maintained network and desktop computers, diagnosed network outages with sniffers, and installed workstation updates.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Sociology and Social Work Psychology
